text: Hi guys, I'm using the API and suddenly get this error: resulted in a `402 Payment Required` response: {"message":"Portal XXXXXX has exceeded its OBJECT_CREATION contact limit of 1000","errorType":"LimitExceededException", this is a entreprise test account. ideas on why this happens?
<@U7ASCEQQK> it seems like your account have limit of 1000 contacts only, but this should not be the case here in enterprise the base limit is 10k
you might try with creating a contact using the backend if that works, or might check your pricing and billing section
I tested with GUI + API, same error. I have deleted contacts and re-added again, maybe the "trash" is filling up?

Hello everyone :slightly_smiling_face: I am new to HubSpot so please go easy on me if I ask a dumb question here. I want to subscripe to webhook events in my account.. I have a developer account, created an app, set up scopes and webhook.. how do I connect the app to my account? I have tried copied the OAuth URL and granted access with my account, but still the app is not in the "app" list. And in the redirect URL I get back a code.. what should I do with the code? :stuck_out_tongue:

Hi to everyone! My name is El yousfi Mohammed, I'm from Morocco and I'm an intern at Webeuz company. I am in charge for integration of <http://veriphone.io|veriphone.io> web app with HubSpot.
Any ideas how ?
Hey <@U7ASCEQQK> I’m guessing this is a trial portal since those have a limit of 1k contacts.  Can you dm me the portal ID and I can see what’s going on?

Hey <@UTHKEJ1HQ> you got halfway there :slightly_smiling_face: You need to redeem the code for a refresh and access token. This is the endpoint to do that <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/oauth2/get-access-and-refresh-tokens>
Once you do that, your app should show up in the app list
Hey <@UTWGHK6QG> Can you tell me more about what you want this integrate to do?  From there I may be able to offer more specific guidance on how to architect this integration
Hi Zack, ID: 2662719, its a test account that we use for integrations and testing etc :slightly_smiling_face:
Thanks :slightly_smiling_face:
ok, are you still seeing the error, my dashboard is showing only 87 contacts out of the 1k limit?
I deleted all to trash, but i think the trash count as well?

I have a web application Instantly find if a phone number is valid or not. And I want to integrate this with HubSpot so whenever a new user register and add his phone number verifies automaticlly if this numer is valid or not

Hi everyone,
I have created a custom integration on HubSpot. How can I create a custom trigger which can be available in my workflow
Many Thanks !

<@U7ASCEQQK> it shouldn’t, I just created a test contact your account via the API and it didn’t give me an error message.  There may have been a slight delay in between you deleting the contacts and the limit being reset to the correct level

Sounds like you’ll want webhooks <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/webhooks/webhooks-overview> You can subscript to the phone number property so an any update to the phone number you can mark it as valid or not
ah, ok :slightly_smiling_face: Thanks for checking!
okkey. Thank you very much
Hello. I am new to HubSpot integration, I want to know if I can connect my application to HubSpot instead of oauth method?
Do you mean a custom action or a custom reason to enroll?
Not for webhooks, that requires OAuth. IF this is for something different, you can use an API key to authenticate your requests to HubSpot
does anyone use <https://github.com/HubSpotWebTeam/hs-node-api>? it looks active, but i'm not sure how to use it to create a blog post. if anyone has an example, i'd really appreciate it.

Hi <@UFBNA9K9A>, it's nice to see your answer related to this topic again.
I have a concern, should this procedure also must to be done for developer accounts? According to the HubSpot documentation, it is not necessary, but I can't find a way to add the app to a developer account.
Deal Search is not working..
